markdownRemark.excerpt: Focus on one major idea. Give people a reason to care. Build your idea with familiar concepts. Make your idea worth sharing.
markdownRemark.html:
• Focus on one major idea.
  • Give people a reason to care.
  • Build your idea with familiar concepts.
  • Make your idea worth sharing.

frontmatter.title: TED's secret to great public speaking
